name: ASCPEM-PRF-5 - Data Resource Read Access Unsupported by Index Element
description:
Objective
Detection of occurrences of this pattern helps decrease software resource waste by preventing unnecessary full scan of data tables.

Consequence
Software featuring known under-efficient SQL Query and Data Access constructs requires excessive computational resources

qualityRules.name: Quality Rules in numeric ID order
